title: Amazon extends AirTag, AirPods, iPad, Apple Watch Prime Day deals from $19
description: Prime Day 2025 may technically be over, but that hasn't stopped Amazon from extending some of its best deals on Apple gear. html:
Sat Jul 12 2025, 05:14 PM EDT · 1 minute read

Save up to $442 on Apple products with extended Prime Day deals - Image credit: Apple

If you buy through our links, we may get a commission. Read our ethics policy.

Prime Day 2025 may technically be over, but that hasn't stopped Amazon from extending some of its best deals on Apple gear. Grab AirPods from just $89 and iPads from $279.

There are plenty of deals to choose from, but the below offers are some of the best available on everything from AirPods Pro 2 that are $100 off to $442 off the 16-inch M4 Max MacBook Pro.

Apple Prime Day deals extended

  • AirPods 4: $89 ($40 off)
  • AirPods Pro 2: $149 ($100 off)
  • Beats Studio Pro: $169.95 ($180 off)
  • AirTag: Single pack $19.99 ($10 off), 4-pack for $64.99 ($35 off)
  • Apple Watch Series 10 (42mm Aluminum Case, GPS): $279 ($120 off)
  • 11" iPad A16 (128GB, Wi-Fi): $279 ($70 off)
  • 11" iPad Air M3 (128GB, Wi-Fi): $479 ($120 off)
  • Mac mini M4 Pro (12C CPU, 16C GPU, 24GB, 512GB): $1,259 ($140 off)
  • 13" MacBook Air M4 (16GB, 256GB) in Midnight: $849 ($150 off)
  • 15" MacBook Air M4 (16GB, 256GB): $1,049 ($150 off)
  • 14" MacBook Pro M4 (10C CPU, 10C GPU, 16GB, 512GB): $1,427.50 ($172 off)
  • 16" MacBook pro M4 Max (16C CPU, 40C GPU, 48GB, 1TB): $3,557.50 ($442 off)
  • Blowout deal at Amazon-owned Woot: 13" MacBook Air M2 (8C CPU, 8GB, 256GB) Refurb: $619.99 ($380 off)

You can also see how Amazon's prices compare to other retailers, as well as find a breakdown of offers across hundreds of sets of specs and various colorways, in our Apple Price Guide.
